attributes.action: create legislation banning Jade Goody from our televison screens and newspapers because she is not a 'celebrity'
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Jade Goody once came fourth in Big Brother. That seems to have elevated her to celebrity status. This is a poor reflection of our 'must be famous' society. Please do not encourage this woman anymore.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
